meanings.definition: To make or create something together with others.
meanings.sent1: My friends and I enjoy comaking art projects during our free time.
meanings.sent2: The students comaking a presentation for their class worked well together.
meanings.sent3: Comaking a delicious meal with my family turned into a fun competition.
meanings.sent4: The team comaking a plan for the event ensured every detail was perfect.
meanings.sent5: Comaking a beautiful garden with my neighbors brought us closer together.

meanings.definition: The act of collaborating with others to produce something.
meanings.sent1: Comaking in the workshop led to a fantastic invention.
meanings.sent2: The comaking of the play involved many talented individuals.
meanings.sent3: The comaking of the cake at the bake sale was a big hit.
meanings.sent4: Their comaking in the charity event made a real difference in the community.
meanings.sent5: The comaking of the mural brightened up the entire neighborhood.
